name: Golem

attacks.name: Explode
attacks.effect: Golem deals 120 damage to itself. Deal 20 damage to all Benched Pokemon. Do not apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.

attacks.name: Massive Quake
attacks.effect: Deal 20 damage to all Benched Pokemon that are not Ground Type. Apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.

flavor: A little pressure has turned this Pokemon into a ticking time bomb. It's best to lead them away from population centers and try to get them to explode.
